Name: Base Station License, Approval, High Class Deluxe, LTD, Bronx
Title: A Local Law in relation to the approval of a determination by the Taxi and Limousine Commission to approve an application by High Class Deluxe, LTD. also known as High Class Deluxe, LTD for a license to operate a new base station in the borough of The Bronx.
Text:
Be it enacted by the Council as follows:

      Section one.  The determination by the Taxi and Limousine Commission to approve an application by High Class Deluxe, LTD. also known as High Class Deluxe, LTD for a license to operate a new base station at 1700 Jerome Avenue in the borough of The Bronx is hereby approved.
      ï¿½2.  This local law shall take effect immediately. 


LS#2603
